_header: Worshipful brother and ever in mind
_description: A letter in verse — six quatrains, followed by 5 lines

BLHar2399.First Lines:
Worschefull brother and euer yn myndeBeyth noth dysplesyd that y
                    woll say…
BLHar2399.Last Lines:
…With all þe new tydynges of þe contreBut euer be y
                    schal hym onder stonde
BLHar2399.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.173-4.
